Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that result in successful payment (i.e., end with 'Payment Handled') versus those that lead to rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs in cases where the prior activity was 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' relative to the total number of activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' compared to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' within the same case variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of process variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' that include 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' as the first approval step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' events associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across all process instances
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of process variants in which 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' appears at least once
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases that complete the full sequence ending in 'Payment Handled' without any rejection loops
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that are not followed by any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in variants that do not involve 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' or 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurring in 2018 versus 2017, considering the expansion of data collection to the entire university
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all approval activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', and 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER']"}"
